briefTitle: A Study of the Effect of Nebivolol to Evaluate Its Vasodilatory Effects in Hypertensive Patients
officialTitle: Effect of Nebivolol on Forearm Vasodilation, Nitric Oxide Bioavailability, and Oxidative Stress in Patients With Stage 1/2 Hypertension
summary: The study is designed to compare the effects of nebivolol (10, 20, 40mg/day) with another beta blocker, extended-release metoprolol, at a range of doses. Its purpose is to study the mechanism of action of nebivolol on forearm blood flow, nitric oxide availability and other biomarkers.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage Change From Baseline to End of Treatment for the Difference Between the Post-ischemia and Pre-ischemia Forearm Vascular Resistance (FVR).
